title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 168.4 - Allowable expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 168.4 - Allowable expenditures

State Regulations

Employment preparation education program funds may be spent
only for personal services, employee benefits, equipment, supplies and
materials, contractual services, travel expenses, staff development and
training, and other such expenditures approved by the commissioner. Such
expenditures shall be made only for employment preparation education program
purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
168.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
